headline: GOP gubernatorial hopeful PA Sen. Jake Corman visits Berks County
author: Karen Shuey
sentences: Pennsylvania Senate President Pro Tempore Jake Corman, the most powerful elected Republican in Pennsylvania, stood inside the lobby of Alvernia University’s new Reading CollegeTowne campus and scanned his surroundings proudly.
Down a flight of stairs was Alvernia’s new small business incubator and a handful of pristine labs and class ...

Around a corner was the new office for Berk Community Television.
On one side there was the city’s first Starbucks.
